ONE THOUSAND CUTS: Watch your enemy
/Lotus/Language/G1Quests/Update15DarvoDe: Today’s deal, the Buzlok rifle at 50% off the usual market price.
Today’s deal, the Penta grenade launcher at half off the usual market price.
Today only, the Illiac Armor Bundle for half what you would usually pay.
One day only, the Kubrow Starter Kit at %50 off.
Buy the Stay Frosty Pack for half price, today only.
Another day another deal. Today only, buy Harkonar Armor Set for half the usual price.
/Lotus/Language/G1Quests/VorTauntA: I am sworn protector of this system. Leave now or pay with your head!
/Lotus/Language/G1Quests/VorTauntB: I've sent word to the ruling Sisters. Reinforcements will be arriving soon.
/Lotus/Language/G1Quests/VorTauntC: Are you still alive? I suppose it is better this way. I have room for one more head in my collection!
/Lotus/Language/G1Quests/VorTauntD: I look forward to meeting you.
/Lotus/Language/G1Quests/VorTauntE: Time to had another Tenno head to my collection.
/Lotus/Language/G1Quests/VorTauntF: You look weak. Nervous. I hope that expression comes out for my trophy case.
/Lotus/Language/G1Quests/VorsPrizeInboxP: INTERCEPTED GRINEER MESSAGE: Your Final Disappointment
INTERCEPTED GRINEER MESSAGE: Attention All Grineer
/Lotus/Language/G1Quests/XmasAlert4ToolT: Exterminate the forces repairing the Corpus Fleet.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/AcolyteAreaCast: The Orokin named Alad V is our target, but we’ll fight you if you wish.
He seeks only profit. He uses you.
This Orokin seeks to profit from our demise.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/AcolyteControlT: This one has caused much suffering and yet you protect him... why?
You have lost your way Tenno, I will help you find it.
You are not the one we seek.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/AcolyteDuellist: |PLAYER_NAME|, your arrogance will be your demise.
|PLAYER_NAME|, your Lotus will watch you perish.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/AcolyteHeavyTau: We will not tolerate this disturbance.
We will not abide this insurrection.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/AcolyteRogueTau: Our fight is not with you Tenno.
I see you are still their servants.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/AcolyteStrikerT: It is not time for your trial yet.
Virtue gives us the strength of a thousand Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Ambulas_Taunt3: Incursion probability: Negligent. Tenno Mortality Probability: Inevitable.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Ambulas_Taunt4: Enemy Amplitude: Paltry. Threat Level: Null.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Ambulas_Taunt5: Enemy Proximity: Immediate. Defensive Systems Employed: Calcitration.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Anyo_Taunt1: Is this a gathering of the freaks?
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Anyo_Taunt2: Orokin secrets cannot remain secret forever... start talking!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Anyo_Taunt3: From pods you have come, in caskets you will go!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Anyo_Taunt4: Fashion victims about to become murder victims!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Anyo_Taunt5: This is your final warning |PLAYER_NAME|. Leave this system at once.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Anyo_Taunt6: I grow tired of waiting |PLAYER_NAME|. Will you face me?
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Anyo_Taunt7: That |PLAYER_WARFRAME| will look great hanging on my wall.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Anyo_Taunt9: You call that skill? Clan |CLAN_NAME| should be ashamed.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Boss_ClanInsult: So happy I can add more |CLAN_NAME| notches to my belt!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Boss_Introducti: Should we do introductions? I am |ENEMY_NAME|. My |ENEMY_WEAPON| is looking forward to meeting you.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Boss_MultipleCl: What is this? |CLAN_NAME|? |CLAN_NAMEB|? I should have known the The Tenno clans were uniting!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Boss_TwoPlayerI: |PLAYER_NAME| are you sure |PLAYER_NAMEB| will be there for you when you fall?
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Boss_WarframeIn: I will crush you and your |PLAYER_WARFRAME| Warframe!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Boss_WeaponInsu: You think your puny |PLAYER_WEAPON| scares me, |PLAYER_NAME|? Rank |PLAYER_WEAPON_RANK| is pathetic!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Boss_WeaponModI: A |PLAYER_WEAPON| with only |PLAYER_WEAPON_MODCOUNT|? I do not think |PLAYER_NAME| will last long!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/DethCubeChirp1: Master |PLAYER_NAME|... my code is to kill. I hope this pleases you.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/DethCubeChirp2: Master |PLAYER_NAME|, you gave me life. I am honored to repay you in death.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/DethCubeChirp3: Master |PLAYER_NAME|, I am ready. Let us begin our destruction, together
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/DethCubeChirp4: I am enemy to all but you, Master |PLAYER_NAME|.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/DethCubeChirp5: When I initialized my circuits this morning my first thought was - I wonder who |PLAYER_NAME| will have me to kill today?
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/DethCubeChirp6: Master |PLAYER_NAME| I am ready for the hunt. Lead me.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Golem_Taunt1: (We were countless. Consume us. Be reborn.)
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Golem_Taunt2: (Why do you destroy us? We are your flesh.)
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Golem_Taunt3: (We embrace you. Why do you defile us?)
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Golem_Taunt4: (Unburden yourself from this mortal coil, |PLAYER_NAME|. Join us.)
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Hek_Taunt1: All those who oppose Grineer policy and expansion shall fall!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Hek_Taunt2: This system is far too small both you and I, |PLAYER_NAME|. One of us has to go, and it isn't me.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Hek_Taunt3: Grineer foreign policy begins and ends at the tip of my |ENEMY_WEAPON|!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Hek_Taunt4: oh look! It says here you are next on my hit-list, |PLAYER_NAME|!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Hek_Taunt5: You think I'm ugly? Well, wait 'til I'm through with you, |PLAYER_NAME|!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Hek_Taunt6: What I lack in diplomacy, I make up for in limb severing ferocity!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Hek_Taunt7: Can't we all just get along? Come give your old Uncle Hek a hug, |PLAYER_NAME|!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Hek_Taunt8: I see you have come pre-equipped with you very own body bag, |PLAYER_NAME|!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/HyenaDeath01: Hyena destroyed, our circuits demand revenge.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/HyenaDeath03: Hyena disabled, the pack grows weak.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/HyenaNew_Taunt1: The Pack calls for your death.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/HyenaNew_Taunt2: The Pack says: 'kill the weakest first'.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/HyenaNew_Taunt3: The Pack says: 'pick them off one by one'
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/HyenaNew_Taunt4: The Pack is designed to enjoy this, it is in its circuits.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/HyenaNew_Taunt5: The Pack sings when you die.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/HyenaNew_Taunt6: Our circuits are happiest when inflicting pain
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Hyena_AppoachTa: The Pack grows excited, we have been waiting for this.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Hyena_Taunt2: Enemy acumen: Inane. Threat Level: Reduced.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Hyena_Taunt5: Enemy Proximity: Immediate. Defensive Systems Employed: Dismemberment.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Jackal_Taunt2: Enemy Analysis: Organic. Threat Level: Impotent.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Jackal_Taunt4: Prototype engagement test: Ready. Tenno destruction analytics: Recording.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kela_Taunt1: Tenno, in my domain... No matter... They shan't survive long...
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kela_Taunt2: The Tenno lives... This interests me... I must learn more...
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kela_Taunt3: This Tenno... It continues to mock me with its insolence...
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kela_Taunt4: Be warned... I will not abide your intrusion, Tenno...
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kela_Taunt5: I know your name, |PLAYER_NAME|... There is little you can hide from me... Run... While you can...
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kela_Taunt6: You have forced my hand |PLAYER_NAME|... Know that it was Kela de Thaym who ended your existence...
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kela_Taunt8: First... I will kill you, |PLAYER_NAME|... Then... I will eradicate every last member of |CLAN_NAME|!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kela_Taunt9: The Sisters... They will reward me well... When I present your head to them...
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kril_Taunt1: Beneath those suits exists flesh. Flesh bleeds. |PLAYER_NAME| bleeds.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kril_Taunt10: Trust me when I say you won’t feel a thing.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kril_Taunt11: You ever get hammered in that suit?
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kril_Taunt2: I forgot my nails... I guess |PLAYER_NAME| will have to do!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kril_Taunt3: Does that second-skin peel away just as easy as the first?
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kril_Taunt4: Grineer immortality begins with the strike of my hammer!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kril_Taunt5: I have seen and conquered many clans. |CLAN_NAME| will be next!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kril_Taunt6: I am Lech Kril. My hammer awaits your skull.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kril_Taunt7: The sound of hammer shattering ice is pure auditory perfection!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kril_Taunt8: And I will strike down upon |PLAYER_NAME| with great vengeance and furious anger!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Kril_Taunt9: Hold still and I’ll make this quick.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/LephantisCombat: (Unburden yourself from this mortal coil, |PLAYER_NAME|. Join us.)
(We were countless. Consume us. Be reborn.)
(We embrace you. Why do you defile us?)
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/LephantisInGame: (We were countless. Consume us. Be reborn.)
(Why do you destroy us? We are your flesh.)
(We embrace you. Why do you defile us?)
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Lephantis_Taunt: Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!
Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!
Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Phorid_Taunt1: (Revoke the frailities of flesh. Let us in.)
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Phorid_Taunt2: (We are the vessel through which immortality is achieved. Assimilate, |PLAYER_NAME|.)
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Phorid_Taunt3: (Through the coalescence of flesh and universal will, we will exist as one.)
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Phorid_Taunt4: (Tenuous is your human spirit, |PLAYER_NAME|. Let us be your salvation.)
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Raptor_SystemTa: Analyzing Threat Vitality: Target death imminent
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Razorback_Taunt: |PLAYER_NAME| Detected: May the Void take mercy upon you
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Regor_Taunt1: You shall suffer as we have, |PLAYER_NAME|.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Regor_Taunt2: Your little dress-up party ends here, |CLAN_NAME|
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Regor_Taunt3: We should accessorize your suit with some holes... bullet holes.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Regor_Taunt4: You realize we haven't celebrated Halloween in about a millenia, right?
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Regor_Taunt5: You have violated the dress code of this vessel. Failure to comply is punishable by death.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Regor_Taunt6: Take the 'Warfra' out of Warframe and what are you left with? You got it, 'me'!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Ruk_Taunt3: You are in the presence of Grineer perfection!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Ruk_Taunt5: Grineer immortality begins with the shedding of flesh.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Ruk_Taunt6: |PLAYER_WARFRAME|? Your pretentious suits are no match for my power!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/SargasRuk_Taunt: Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!
Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!
Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Stalker_TauntDe: I... have failed... this one will remain... unpunished...
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Stalker_TauntEs: You may have survived for now, |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|, but your time WILL come!
You are stronger than I realized, |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|. No matter, this is only a temporary setback.
|LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| you are a more worthy opponent than I expected. You punishment will have to wait.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Stalker_TauntIn: |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME|, you can't run from your past.
|LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| there is no place to hide.
The murder of |BOSS_TAG| will not go unpunished.
The blood of |BOSS_TAG| is on your hands. Did you really think there would be no repercussions?
There is no salvation for your crime against |BOSS_TAG|.
You shall not leave this place!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Stalker_TauntTa: It is done. |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| is no more.
Justice is served. |LOCAL_PLAYER_NAME| has been executed.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt1: You hide behind that |PLAYER_WARFRAME| Warframe. Face me like a true warrior!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt10: I am waiting... You are no match for me!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt12: Your |PLAYER_WARFRAME| Warframe makes you slow and clumsy.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt13: I am waiting... You are no match for me!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt17: This is your final warning |PLAYER_NAME|. Leave this system at once.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt2: You just signed your death warrant, |PLAYER_NAME|.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt3: You call yourself a Warrior? Show some honor.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt5: Your |PLAYER_WEAPON| isn't nearly powerful enough to defeat me!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt6: You call that skill? Clan |CLAN_NAME| should be ashamed.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt7: Your |PLAYER_WEAPON| will make a nice trophy
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt8: Your |PLAYER_WARFRAME| Warframe is no match for my advanced Orokin weaponry!
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_Taunt9: That |PLAYER_WARFRAME| will look great hanging on my wall.
/Lotus/Language/G1Taunts/Vor_TauntIneffe: Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!
Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!
Your puny Tenno power is useless against me!
/Lotus/Language/Game/AladVPetDesc: Fast with claw and missile attacks
/Lotus/Language/Game/AmmoHud: Your HUD shows clip and total ammo.
/Lotus/Language/Game/AuraGrineerLancerRi: Boosts armor and damage of allies
/Lotus/Language/Game/BlastDoorTimerMessa: HOLD THIS POSITION UNTIL THE BYPASS IS COMPLETE
/Lotus/Language/Game/CTF_Description: Capture the opposing Cephalon while protecting your own.
/Lotus/Language/Game/CeresDesc: The Grineer have expanded their empire into this region.
/Lotus/Language/Game/ConclaveLoadoutRequ: A Conclave loadout is required to access this location. Please use the Arsenal to set one up.
/Lotus/Language/Game/ConclaveSyndicateRe: You must be initiated with the Conclave Syndicate to access this location.
/Lotus/Language/Game/ConsoleHackTimeLimi: Hack the consoles before the time limit expires
/Lotus/Language/Game/ControlRiotMoaDesc: Corrals its prey for rapid destruction
/Lotus/Language/Game/ControlRiotMoaDescL: Drover Bursa has an aura that weakens the armor
/Lotus/Language/Game/CoopDoorHelpNeeded: Your teammate needs help to open a door
/Lotus/Language/Game/CoopDoorNotReady: Both panels must be activated simultaneously
/Lotus/Language/Game/CorpusArtificerSent: Charges its target and detonates when threatened
/Lotus/Language/Game/CorpusFlakShipDesc: Voltage grenades detonate to create an electric field
/Lotus/Language/Game/CorpusLaserShipDesc: Armed with a highly accurate laser cannon
/Lotus/Language/Game/CorpusPodDesc: Armed with a Mining Laser and Explosive Launcher
/Lotus/Language/Game/CorpusSpaceTurretDe: Inflicts moderate damage at a fast rate
/Lotus/Language/Game/CorpusSwarmDroneDes: Follows a target while attacking them with lasers
/Lotus/Language/Game/DM_Description: You are alone against many. Annihilate the most Oro to win the match.
/Lotus/Language/Game/DayCommonPlantDesc: This common plant can only be found during the day.
/Lotus/Language/Game/DayRarePlantDesc: This rare plant can only be found during the day.
/Lotus/Language/Game/DayUnCommonPlantDes: This uncommon plant can only be found during the day.
/Lotus/Language/Game/DeathSquadDesc: A member of the infamous Grustrag Three
/Lotus/Language/Game/DeckA: This is the current Battle Deck. Each deck contains an assortment of "Battle Cards"...
/Lotus/Language/Game/DeckB: You draw 5 Battle Cards at random from the deck. This is your personalized assignment...
/Lotus/Language/Game/DeckC: Battle Cards have unique targets, missions, and rewards on them. Keep an eye out for special Quest Cards...
/Lotus/Language/Game/DeckD: When you complete all 5 you receive a special reward! Then you may draw from the deck again...
/Lotus/Language/Game/DigSiteText: Search the area around the Grineer excavation site
/Lotus/Language/Game/DiscOspreyDesc: Energy orb pulses AoE damage after detonation
/Lotus/Language/Game/DispersionRiotMoaDe: Isolator Bursa has an aura that delays and slows shield regeneration
/Lotus/Language/Game/DistanceFomorianObj: Reach minimum |DISTANCE| meters from Fomorian ship
/Lotus/Language/Game/DojoDesc: Your clan is building a hidden fortress on the periphery of the Origin System.
/Lotus/Language/Game/DuelEndsInDraw: The duel between |PLAYER_A| and |PLAYER_B| has ended in a draw
/Lotus/Language/Game/EarthDesc: A desolate, ruined world. Home of the oppressive Grineer Empire.
/Lotus/Language/Game/ErisDesc: Rapid Corpus expansion has led them to build outposts in this far flung sector of the system.
/Lotus/Language/Game/EuropaDesc: This deep space outpost is traditionally home to The Corpus.
/Lotus/Language/Game/ExplosiveBarrelDesc: Contains hazardous materials. Store in a cool, dry place. Do not expose to heat. Do not rupture the container.
/Lotus/Language/Game/ExterminateMissionF: Mission Failure Imminent. Eliminate Remaining Targets!
/Lotus/Language/Game/FomorianInjectionSt: Used to refuel Fomorian reactor cores
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerArtificerSen: Charges its target and detonates when threatened
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerBeastMasterD: Summons Drahk to fight for it
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerCatMasterDes: Summons Hyekka to fight for it
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerChargerDesc: Charges foes with devastating melee attacks
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerCombatCatDes: Trained to hunt down the Infestation
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerCombatPodDes: Armed with a Demolition Cannon and Mining Drill
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerKubrowDesc: Thick dermal plates adorn its hide
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerMissilePlatf: Locks opponents in a tractor field preventing escape
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerMissileShiel: A Hellion Dargyn equipped with Shield defences
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerMissileSkiff: Missiles seek out targets and inflict high damage
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerRegulatorDes: Grants nearby Grineer units extra speed and damage
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerRegulatorFor: Grants nearby Grineer units extra speed and damage
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerSawmanPiston: Slow but very powerful melee attacks
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerShieldSkiffD: A Dargyn equipped with Shield defences
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerSkiffDesc: Inflicts moderate damage at a fast rate
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerSpaceDroneDe: Fires slow projectiles that inflict moderate damage
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerSpaceTurretD: Inflicts moderate damage at a fast rate
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerStandingGunD: A turret armed with twin, double-barrel cannons
/Lotus/Language/Game/GrineerStasisDroneD: Emits a tractor beam, slowing its target down
/Lotus/Language/Game/HekCombatPodDesc: Armed with an Asteroid Splitter and Mining Drill
/Lotus/Language/Game/HekPropDroneDesc: Boosts Grineer morale while weakening enemies
/Lotus/Language/Game/HelpElectrifiedBudd: |playerName| is electrified and needs your help!
/Lotus/Language/Game/HostileSandmanDesc: Watches over the Tomb of Inaros.
/Lotus/Language/Game/HostileSandmanGiant: Awoken by the Protector to help defend the Tomb of Inaros.
/Lotus/Language/Game/HyenaElecDesc: Charging attacks with a Power Drain and HUD Scrambling Aura
/Lotus/Language/Game/HyenaFireDesc: Heavy AoE attacks with a Heat Resistance Aura
/Lotus/Language/Game/HyenaGunDesc: Long range attacks with Shield Recharge Aura
/Lotus/Language/Game/HyenaIceDesc: Strong Melee attacks with a Slow Aura
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedAncientDise: Spawns maggots that attack its target
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedAncientDisr: Heavy melee unit with a disrupting attack
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedAncientHeal: Heavy melee that applies damage reduction buff to allies.
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedAncientPuss: Riddled with boils that erupt into spawn pods when hit
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedDevourerDes: Part of an interconnected network of Infested organs. Function remains unclear.
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedHiveADesc: Generates a coldness that reduces shields
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedHiveEDesc: Creates a field that lowers gravity
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedLightningCr: Shocks nearby enemies with a bio-electrical attack
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedMoaGooDesc: Discharges tar-like mucus slowing its prey
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedNoxiousCraw: Releases a poison cloud on death
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedSuicideRunn: Fast and explodes when near enemies
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedSyringeDesc: Injects antiserum into Vaporizers or the user to prevent armor degradation.
/Lotus/Language/Game/InfestedToxicAncien: Heavy melee unit surrounded by poison cloud
/Lotus/Language/Game/IntelMissionConditi: Bring all |IntelNumRequired| Datamass objects to extraction!
Bring the Datamass object to extraction!
/Lotus/Language/Game/JetpackHeavyMarineD: Mobile heavy unit that utilizes a grenade launcher
/Lotus/Language/Game/JupiterDesc: Once overrun by the Infestation, The Corpus are now exploiting Jupiter for its vast deposits of rare gases.
/Lotus/Language/Game/KillAllWithMelee: Kill All Enemies with Melee Weapon
/Lotus/Language/Game/KillAllWithPrimary: Kill All Enemies with Primary Weapon
/Lotus/Language/Game/KillAllWithSecondar: Kill All Enemies with Secondary Weapon
/Lotus/Language/Game/KillEnemiesWithinTi: Kill |COUNT| enemies - melee orbs for extra time!
/Lotus/Language/Game/KubrowDenLongDesc: Fiercely guarded by their owners, the Kubrow den is capable of housing an entire pack of the feral creatures. Once disturbed, these animals will whip themselves into a frenzy attacking anything they deem a threat.
/Lotus/Language/Game/KubrowLongDesc: After the fall of the Orokin, these former pets were left to fend for themselves. Only the most vicious survived, evolving into deadly pack hunters that now pervade every inch of Earth's dense forest. Intensely territorial, the Kubrow will attack any creature unlucky enough to cross their path.
/Lotus/Language/Game/LeaderFireDesc: Grants fire and explosion resistance to nearby allies
/Lotus/Language/Game/LeaderIceDesc: Grants cold resistance to nearby allies and slows enemies
/Lotus/Language/Game/LeaderMagDesc: Grants electric resistance to nearby allies and scrambles the HUD of Tenno
/Lotus/Language/Game/LeaderToxicDesc: Grants Toxin resistance to nearby allies
/Lotus/Language/Game/MacheteWomanDesc: Lethal melee unit with ranged harpoon attack
/Lotus/Language/Game/Map: Use the mini-map to locate objectives.
/Lotus/Language/Game/MarsDesc: Corpus salvage ships pick through the fragments of Orokin derelicts here.
/Lotus/Language/Game/MercuryDesc: The only remaining Orokin Towers are hidden here. The Grineer patrol this area to prevent Tenno incursion.
/Lotus/Language/Game/MiniJackalTurretDes: Attacks any target hostile to the Lynx
/Lotus/Language/Game/MissionMasteryRequi: Your Mastery Rank must be |RANK| or higher to access this location.
/Lotus/Language/Game/MissionQuestRequire: You must complete |ITEM| in order to access this location.
/Lotus/Language/Game/MoaBouncerDesc: Fires energy based projectiles that bounce
/Lotus/Language/Game/NeptuneDesc: Home of the Corpus and site of their indoctrination temples. Warframe and Robotics R&D hidden here.
/Lotus/Language/Game/NightCommonPlantDes: This common plant can only be found at night.
/Lotus/Language/Game/NightRarePlantDesc: This rare plant can only be found at night.
/Lotus/Language/Game/NightUnCommonPlantD: This uncommon plant can only be found at night.
/Lotus/Language/Game/NullifySpaceManDesc: Energy shield blocks projectiles and nullifies powers
/Lotus/Language/Game/PVPImpactDuelDraw: The duel ended in a draw
/Lotus/Language/Game/PVPImpactDuelIssued: You have challenged |PLAYER| to a duel
/Lotus/Language/Game/PVPImpactDuelReceiv: |PLAYER| has challenged you to a duel
/Lotus/Language/Game/PetCatbrowLongDesc: Kavats are engineered from genetic strains taken from their hyekka and feral kavat descendants.
/Lotus/Language/Game/PetKubrowLongDesc: Kubrow are hatched from eggs grown in the Incubator. Kubrow Eggs can be found in Kubrow Dens on Earth or purchased in the Market.
/Lotus/Language/Game/PhobosDesc: The Grineer have occupied the abandoned settlements here.
/Lotus/Language/Game/PlayerAcceptedDuel: |PLAYER_A| has accepted a challenge to duel from |PLAYER_B|
/Lotus/Language/Game/PlayerDialog_Synthe: I would like to run the Synthesis simulation.
/Lotus/Language/Game/PlayerDialog_Vendor: I want to sell my wares.
/Lotus/Language/Game/PlutoDesc: The shattered Outer Terminus of the Solar Rail Network is located here. The Corpus work to rebuild it.
/Lotus/Language/Game/PreventionRiotMoaDe: Blocks choke points to protect objectives
Denial Bursa has an aura that weakens armor and slows and delays shield regeneration
/Lotus/Language/Game/PursuitObjective: Locate and Disable the Courier Ship
/Lotus/Language/Game/PveDeathMatchCompet: Modifiers: One Life + Health Drain + Scaling Enemies
/Lotus/Language/Game/RestorativeErrorTea: NOT ALL TEAMMATES IN RANGE. USE AGAIN TO OVERRIDE WARNING.
/Lotus/Language/Game/SB_Description: Ancient team sport of the lost Orokin era.
/Lotus/Language/Game/SaturnDesc: A Grineer stronghold with well-protected shipping lanes and training orbiters for their Elite troops.
/Lotus/Language/Game/ScannerObjectDesc: Locates dig sites to deploy Excavators when powered
/Lotus/Language/Game/ScavengerDroneDesc: Collects fallen items on the battlefield
/Lotus/Language/Game/SednaDesc: The Grineer have expanded their empire into this region.
/Lotus/Language/Game/SpaceAttackDroneDes: Weak, but aggressive with a high rate of fire
/Lotus/Language/Game/SpiritJarDesc: A peculiar relic from the tomb of Inaros.
/Lotus/Language/Game/SuicideDroneDesc: Charges its target and detonates when threatened
/Lotus/Language/Game/SurvivalChallenge: Survive until the timer runs out
/Lotus/Language/Game/TAG_INSTRUCTIONS2: FIRE SECONDARY TO TAG NEW TARGET
/Lotus/Language/Game/TDM_Description: Annihilate the Oro of the opposing Team to win victory.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TennoWay_MaduraiDes: They followed the path of Engage The Enemy. Their swift, uncompromising onslaught, holding nothing back and recklessly attacking their foes, could vanquish an opponent before he had the chance to steel himself. Speed and savagery characterized this school.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TennoWay_NaramonDes: This discipline focused on Knowing The Enemy, and the tacticians of Naramon believed that to truly understand a foe would confer the greatest advantage upon a warrior.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TennoWay_UnairuDesc: They pushed themselves to Outlast The Enemy, to withstand all aggression without retreat. They believed that if the enemy could not match their endurance, then a battle could be won without having even commenced.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TennoWay_VazarinDes: They trained to Counter The Enemy, and move with an opponent’s attacks in order to nullify them. They maintained constant awareness in order to defend against all aggression.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TennoWay_ZenurikDes: They believed the clearest path to victory was to Dominate the Enemy. They sought to choke an opponent of all resources; that sheer strength could erase any resistance.
/Lotus/Language/Game/Tutorial26a_Windows: We can't afford to waste any more time. I have unscrambled the portal. Get out of here. As fast as you can, run.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialAffinity1: Along with more power, levels unlock slots for 'Mods' to customize your arsenal.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialBoostersEnd: Collect all of the Artifacts to give your squad the edge in combat.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialBoostersInt: These are the Artifacts of the Orokin War. Each provides unique boosts to you and your teammates during missions.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialBoostersPla: Each player may chose an Artifact from their collection before the mission begins.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialFoundryComp: Search ships and defeat enemies to obtain Components. The components found are influenced by the Region of space you are in.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialFoundryEnd: The Foundry is key to owning the most powerful weapons and artifacts that exist!
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialFoundryIntr: This is the Foundry. Here you will build powerful new items to expand your arsenal.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialFoundryReqs: To build an item requires a Blueprint and its Components. While there are Blueprints in the Market, most are hidden throughout the system.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialRank: Complete missions and level up weapons to qualify for higher ranks.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialShields: Shields absorb most damage types before health is affected.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialStarchartAl: Completing a region activates its real-time alerts. This is key to attacking high-value targets.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialStarchartEn: You begin at Mercury's Terminus, your only way in to the system. It is time for the Tenno to return.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialStarchartIn: Welcome Tenno. This is the 'Origin' system and you... are its ward.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialStarchartNe: Our enemies control the ancient Solar Rail network. Complete missions to unlock new regions!
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialStarchartOn: You control how I connect you with other Tenno agents. You may freely join other agents, restrict it to your contacts, or go in alone.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialTest: Complete the trial to join us!
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialWarframeAct: Use <ACTIVATE_ABILITY_0> to activate the first power.
/Lotus/Language/Game/TutorialWarframePow: Warframe Power TEMPORARILY unlocked. Use the Arsenal to upgrade weapons and unlock powers as you level up...
/Lotus/Language/Game/UranusDesc: Remote Grineer bases focus on research and development of bio-modification and gene repair.
/Lotus/Language/Game/VenusDesc: The Corpus have focused their manufacturing facilities in this area.
/Lotus/Language/Game/VoidDesc: Ancient Orokin places are hidden here.
/Lotus/Language/Game/WardenLeaderDesc: Life leech weapon, increased speed, weak to stealth takedowns
/Lotus/Language/GameModes/AssassinationD: Assassination contracts mark high priority targets around the system. Hunt down and eliminate these enemies, then head to extraction.
/Lotus/Language/GameModes/DeceptionDesc: Enter the enemy ship, and hack their navigation console to redirect their path. At the start of deception missions, a data mass will spawn next to the Tenno. It can be picked up with the <USE> key, but will prevent the carrier from using their primary weapon. Take the datamass through the mission and place it in the enemy navigation console.
/Lotus/Language/GameModes/DefenseDesc: Defend an important target against waves of enemy units. If the defense target is destroyed, the mission automatically fails. Every 5 waves choose to stay and fight or extract from the mission.
/Lotus/Language/GameModes/ExterminateDes: Enter the level and kill every enemy you encounter. Leave no one standing.
/Lotus/Language/GameModes/SabotageDesc: Infiltrate the enemy hold, and cripple their operation by striking at vulnerable points. The mini map will lead you to the target. Once it has been destroyed, get to extraction as fast as possible.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Mods_FusionAmmo: Mods of the same polarity provide twice the fusion energy than Mods of different polarities.
Get the most fusion energy out of your mods by fusing duplicates.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Mods_FusionEner: Rare mods require more energy to rank up. They also provide more energy when fused.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Mods_TransmuteR: The rarity of mods being transmuted will increase the odds of producing a rare mod.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Mods_TransmuteS: The item compatability of mods being transmuted will influence the item compatibility of the mod you receive.
The polarity of mods being transmuted will influence the polarity of the mod you receive.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/SlideDesc: Press <CROUCH> while sprinting to perform a slide manuever.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/SlideDesc_ALT: Hold <HOLD_CROUCH> while sprinting to perform a slide manuever.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_AurasA: Aura mods add to your total mod capacity.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_Capaci: Capacity is the larger of a Weapon's Rank and your Mastery Rank, and is doubled if an Orokin Reactor or Catalyst is installed.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_ColdDa: Cold <DT_FREEZE> damage can slow down enemies and deal damage.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_Differ: Enemies are resistant and vulnerable to various elements. Use the Codex scanner to learn about them.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_Electr: Electricity <DT_ELECTRICITY> damage is capable of stunning and damaging enemies.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_Elemen: Combine primary elemental damage types to create secondary ones.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_FireDa: Heat <DT_FIRE> damage will burn and scorch foes.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_MatchP: If the polarity of the mod and the slot you install it on match, the capacity cost of the mod will be halved.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_ModTut: Press <MENU_RTRIGGER1> to view the mod tutorial.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_OrderO: Install Companion precepts in the order you want them to be followed, starting from upper-left.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_Stance: Stance mods unlock the ability to perform advanced combos.
Stance mods add to your total mod capacity.
/Lotus/Language/GameTips/Upgrades_oxinDa: Toxin <DT_POISON> damage is effective at damaging an enemy's health.
/Lotus/Language/HolsterCustomizations/Da: Daggers are holstered at the left hip.
/Lotus/Language/HolsterCustomizations/Du: Dual Daggers are holstered on each shoulder.
Dual Blades are holstered at the hips.
Dual Blades are holstered on each shoulder.

/Lotus/Language/IRC/ChannelBan: Your access to this channel has been suspended.
/Lotus/Language/IRC/ChannelLocked: You are not currently qualified to use this channel.
/Lotus/Language/IRC/R_MOTD: Recruit for a Squad or Clan here!
/Lotus/Language/Items/AHAkboltoDesc: For the Arbiters of Hexis these pistols are more than simple weapons, they are symbols of truth and discipline.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AHBoltorDesc: Bring down judgement, with this boltor crafted by the Arbiters of Hexis.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AHScarfDesc: With every enemy struck down the Telos Syandana glows stronger.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AbsorbAbilityAugme: [PLACEHOLDER] Absorb Augment - Nyx can move at |SPEED|% speed while using Absorb, but the bubble is |SIZE|% its original size.
Absorb Augment - Creates a ring every 3 seconds that drags in enemies at |PULL_STR| meters per second.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AbsorbAbilityBoost: Boost the amount of damage you can absorb.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AbsorbAbilityDesc: Nyx absorbs all incoming damage and channels that collected energy into an explosive radial discharge.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AcolyteNoggleBundl: A collection of Noggle Statues depicting the followers of the Stalker.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AcolyteStalkerMios: A unique skin for the Lacera used by the Slayer acolyte.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ActuatorDesc: Synthetic tensor components. Used in the manufacture of Corpus Robotics.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AdventurerKubrowDe: Enterprising Orokin genetic designers recognized that the Kubrow's affinity for games of fetch could be used for more serious endeavors. They soon developed a strain adept at reconnaissance and contraband recovery. Tenno often used the creatures to help resupply while in the field.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AffinityBoosterDes: Doubles the rate at which you earn affinity. Upgrade your weapons and Warframes faster.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AggressionEventCor: An insignia marking Tenno who aligned with the Corpus during the Gradivus Dilemma.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AggressionEventGri: An insignia marking Tenno who aligned with the Grineer during the Gradivus Dilemma.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkimboAutoPistolDe: Furis pistols equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkimboBoltoDesc: A Bolto equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkimboHandCannonsD: A Bronco equipped in each hand.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkimboPistolDesc: A Lato equipped in each hand. Twice the clip size and fire rate, but reload time is doubled and accuracy is lowered.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkimboSomaPistolsD: The devastating power of the Soma rifle compacted into two elegant pistols.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkimboViperPistolD: A Viper equipped in each hand.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AklexDesc: Dual Lex pistols double the amount of high caliber lead you can throw at the enemy, but accuracy and reload time suffer.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AkmagnusDesc: Twice the ammo and twice the stopping power of a single Magnus.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AlertiumDesc: Each vial is produced by the painstaking expression of billions of rare, ocean-vent dwelling microorganisms.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AllianceEmblemDesc: An insignia that projects a holographic image of your alliance emblem. Requires a Warlord in the clan that created the alliance to upload an image of the alliance emblem.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AlloyPlateDesc: Carbon steel plates used to reinforce Grineer armor.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AlphaCorruptorDesc: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Beta counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Beta Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AlternateArrowSkin: A unique set of arrows, compatible with any bow.
A unique set of arrows, compatible with any bow.
A unique set of arrows, compatible with any bow.
A collection of unique arrows, compatible with any bow.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AncientHealerBallD: Deploys a ANCIENT HEALER EXIMUS unit to fight for you.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AnkyrosPrimeDesc: This Orokin variation of the Ankyros is superior to its successor in every way.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AntiMatterAgileAni: The Agile Animation Set for Nova.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AntiMatterDesc: Nova uses electromagnetic energy to contain and control highly volatile antimatter that fuels her abilities.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AntiMatterNobleAni: The Noble Animation Set for Nova.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AntlerBowDesc: Evoking the design of ancient bows, the high impact Cernos is perfect for hunting down highly shielded enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/April2015ScarfDesc: A Tenno Syandana evocative of winged night creatures.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArbitersHexisProfi: A profile icon of the Arbiters of Hexis
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcDroneDesc: Diriga shocks nearby enemies, and picks off distant threats, utilizing the Vulklok sniper rifle and the 'Calculated Shot', 'Arc Coil' and 'Electro Pulse' precepts.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcTrapStoreItemDe: Sentinel will zap multiple enemies within range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneAshAltHelmet: This helmet is worn by Ash, and adds Energy Capacity, with a reduction to Speed.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneBansheeAltHe: This helmet is worn by Banshee, and adds Power Efficiency, but reduces duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch.
This helmet is worn by Banshee, and grants Max Energy Boost, with a reduction to Health.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneEmberAltHelm: This helmet is worn by Ember, and adds Health, with a reduction to Speed.
This helmet is worn by Ember, reduces Shields in order to boost Energy Capacity.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneExcaliburAlt: This helmet is worn by Excalibur, and adds Power Strength, with a reduction to Armor.
This helmet is worn by Excalibur, increases Shields at the expense of Health.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneFrostAltHelm: This helmet is worn by Frost, and adds Power Strength, with a reduction to Shields.
This helmet is worn by Frost, increases Armor at the expense of Health.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneJadeAltHelme: This helmet is worn by Nyx, increases velocity of parkour maneuvers, but reduces Shields.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneLokiAltHelme: This helmet is worn by Loki, and adds Power Range, with a reduction to Health.
This helmet is worn by Loki, increases Power Efficiency, but reduces Armor Rating.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneMagAltHelmet: This helmet is worn by Mag, and adds Max Energy, with a reduction to Speed.
This helmet is worn by Mag, gives increased Power Range with a drain on Shields.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneNinjaAltHelm: This helmet is worn by Ash, increases duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch, but reduces Power Efficiency.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneNovaAltHelme: This helmet is worn by Nova, and increases duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch, but reduces Health.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneNyxAltHelmet: This helmet is worn by Nyx, and adds Power Efficiency, with a reduction to Armor.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneRhinoAltHelm: This helmet is worn by Rhino, and adds Speed, with a reduction to Power Strength.
This helmet is worn by Rhino, and increases Health, but reduces Sprint Speed.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneSarynAltHelm: This helmet is worn by Saryn, and increases velocity of parkour maneuvers, but reduces Power Duration.
This helmet is worn by Saryn, and increases Movement Speed, with a reduction to Health.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneTrapperAltHe: This helmet is worn by Vauban, and increases Power Max, with a reduction to Shields.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneTrinityAltHe: This helmet is worn by Trinity, and adds Shield Capacity, with a reduction to Power Efficiency.
This helmet is worn by Trinity, and increases the Power Duration, but adversely affects Health.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneVaubanAltHel: This helmet is worn by Vauban, and increases velocity of parkour maneuvers, but reduces Power Duration.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcaneVoltAltHelme: This helmet is worn by Volt, and adds Power Duration, with a reduction to Shields.
This helmet is worn by Volt, and increases Ability Power, but reduces duration of Aim Glide and Wall Latch.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcataSkinADesc: A stylized arcata skin for Lunaro.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcataSugatraDesc: [PLACEHOLDER] The traditional sugatra for Lunaro for generations.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchAxeDesc: This laser bladed battle-axe easily hacks through a ship's defenses and the forces protecting it.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchBurstGunDesc: Unload deadly accurate bursts of mayhem.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchCannonDesc: When fully charged, this flak-cannon delivers a devastating shot. Perfect for taking down fast-moving interceptors.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchHammerDesc: Using Archwing’s jets for thrust, this massive hammer crushes anything in its path.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchHeavyPistolsDe: Delivering twin streams of highly accurate, rapid-fire ordnance, the Decurion are specifically designed for combat in the vacuum of space.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchHookSwordDesc: Tear apart incoming enemies with this massive hooked blade.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchLongRifleDesc: Devastate free-space enemies with Phaedra, the Soma's big-sister.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchMachinegunDesc: A long range rifle capable of firing in space, the Imperator's versatility makes it an ideal weapon for space combat.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchRailgunDesc: When fully charged, the magnetized barrel of the Velocitus accelerates a metal slug to tremendous speeds, piercing hulls and obliterating armor.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchRocketCrossbow: An Archwing energy weapon that sends waves of deadly plasma crashing into enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchScytheDesc: Become an angel of death, with this Archwing scythe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchSwordDesc: Weightless space turns this impossibly massive sword into an agile instrument of destruction.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArchWingNavCodeDes: Archive detailing the locations of hidden Archwing technology
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcherBundleDesc: Hunt down your prey with this collection of lethal gear. Includes the Ivara Warframe, Rubico sniper rifle,  Lacera sword-whip and the explosive Talon throwing darts. Enhance progression with 3-Day Affinity and Credit Boosters.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArcherBundleFeatur: Hunt down your prey with this collection of lethal gear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArgonCrystalDesc: Void based radioactive resource that decays every day it is out of the void.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AristeasMagicianHe: A uniquely-styled alternate helmet for Limbo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ArtilleryBarrageAb: Creates a localized storm of punishing explosions.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AshAltHelmet2Desc: Locust Helmet for the Ash Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AspAgileAnimsDesc: The Agile Animation Set for Saryn.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AspDesc: Saryn's venomous attacks are horrifyingly effective against organic and synthetic enemies, and her ability to 'shed' her skin makes her very elusive.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AspNobleAnimsDesc: The Noble Animation Set for Saryn.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AssassinBaitBDesc: Lures the Zanuka Hunter out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where assassin would normally appear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AssassinBaitCDesc: Lures the Grustrag Three out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where assassin would normally appear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AssassinBaitDesc: Lures the Stalker out of hiding. One-time use gear item that can only be used in locations where assassin would normally appear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AsymmetricBowDesc: Daikyu takes great strength to draw back, but provides added power and range to every shot.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AttackLensDesc: Channels Affinity into Focus for the Madurai Way.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AutoCrossBowDesc: The Ballistica crossbow features a unique dual firing mechanism. Choose between a four bolt volley or a deadly accurate charged shot.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AutoPistolDesc: The Furis delivers a high damage output in a short time frame thanks to its high rate of fire.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AutoShotgunDesc: A shotgun with low accuracy and strong recoil, but able to deliver its payload in full-auto. The Boar is best used at close range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AvalancheAbilityAu: [Placeholder] Avalanche Augment - Grants allies within the radius a coat of ice that absorbs |ABSORB| damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AvalancheAbilityBo: Increase the range of your Avalanche.
/Lotus/Language/Items/AvalancheAbilityDe: Summons a treacherous landslide of ice that instantly freezes and shatters all enemies in its radius.

/Lotus/Language/Items/BallisticBatteryAb: Ballistic Battery Augment - Applies a |PROC_CHANCE|% status chance bonus to the shot, based on the amount charged.
When activated, this power stores damage caused by guns. When triggered again, that damage is channeled through the next gunshot.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BanishAbilityAugme: Banish Augment - Allies banished to the rift will have |HEALTH_PERCENT|% of their max health restored.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BanishAbilityDesc: Displaces a target into the rift plane, inflicting additional damage if the target is hostile.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BansheeAltHelmet2D: Chorus Helmet for the Banshee Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BansheeAltHelmetDe: Reverb Helmet for the Banshee Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BansheeDefaultHelm: The standard issue helmet for the Banshee warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BansheeDeluxeBundl: Be heard, with this collection of skins for Banshee, Sonicor and the Banshee Soprana sigil.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BansheeDeluxeDesc: Sleek and stylish, Banshee Soprana sings a song of devastation.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BansheeDeluxeHelme: The helmet matching the Banshee Soprana Skin.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BansheePackDesc: Get Banshee and all of her favourite gear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BaroArrowDesc: Arrows of distinction, the perfect compliment for any bow.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BaroCapeDesc: Walk the cutting edge of fashion with this exclusive Ki'Teer original.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BaroPetMaskDesc: A mask designed to match the one worn by Baro Ki'Teer, for your Sentinel pet.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BaroPetTailDesc: A statement piece for any Sentinel.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BaroPetWingsDesc: Soar to new heights of luxury with these angular Sentinel wings.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BasicSolarRailDesc: Constructing a Solar Rail allows travel to previously inaccessible locations. All Tenno who use the rail pay tribute to the Clan who built it.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BeaconDesc: One part of a long lost mathematical proof.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BeamWeaponDesc: Therma is a short range weapon that deals a constant stream of damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerAgileAnim: The Agile Animation Set for Valkyr.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerDeluxeFea: Before Alad V, before the experiments, there was Gersemi Valkyr.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerDeluxeHel: The helmet matching the Valkyr Gersemi Skin.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerDesc: Forged in the labs of the Zanuka project, the original Valkyr was subject to cruel experiments, leaving her scarred, angry and frighteningly adept at killing.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerMeleeDesc: These talons emerge when Valkyr unleashes her Hysteria.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerNobleAnim: The Noble Animation Set for Valkyr.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerPackDesc: Get the new Warframe bundled with boosters and the latest in close-combat weaponry.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerScreamAbi: Warcry Augment - While active, Warcry's duration is increased by |DURATION_INC| seconds for each melee kill.
Valkyr lets out a rallying cry that bolsters her allies melee speed while slowing down nearby enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BerserkerTubesDesc: Remnants of the bonds that restrained the original Valkyr during her time in 'the lab'. A reminder to never forget the torment.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BetaCorruptorDesc: Inert on its own this corruptor is highly effective if mixed with its Alpha counterpart. Properly mixed, these will destabilize Fomorian Reactors much faster than their Stable counterparts. This volatile item cannot be simultaneously equipped with Alpha Corruptors. Recommended for Tenno operating as a team.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BigBoyAbilityDesc: Launches a plodding missile capable of unleashing a massive explosion.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlackoutOrthosDesc: The Void's corrupting energy has scarred this Orthos, leaving it permanently out of phase with conventional space.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlessingAbilityAug: [PLACEHOLDER] Blessing - Allies will gain a |DAMAGE|% damage boost, a |PARKOUR|% Bullet Jump boost, and |KNOCKDOWN|% knockdown resistance.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlessingAbilityBoo: Boosting this ability increases the duration of the invulnerability.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlessingAbilityDes: Restore the health and shields of allies within Trinity’s Affinity aura. These allies also receive a degree of damage immunity, the greater the healing the greater the immunity.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlueAntitoxinBluep: Fuses the extracts from both Moonlight and Sunlight variations of Jadeleaf and Dragonlily to create a potent antitoxin.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlueAntitoxinDesc: This is an extremely effective antitoxin.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlueSkyShipDesc: This blade-like landing craft is armed with Carpet Bomb air-support.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlueSkySkinBundleD: A collection of unique skins for the Scimitar landing craft.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlueSkySkinDeluxeD: A unique skin for the Scimitar landing craft.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlueSkySkinPrimeTr: A unique skin for the Scimitar landing craft.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlueSkySkinSoundDe: A unique skin for the Scimitar landing craft.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlueSkySkinSplashD: A unique skin for the Scimitar landing craft.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BlueSkySkinStalker: Cast the Stalker's caustic shadow across the Scimitar with this skin.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BoPrimeDesc: A classic Orokin weapon, Bo Prime creates elegant fury on the battlefield.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BoarPrimeDesc: One of the finest examples of Tenno craftsmanship, the Boar Prime offers a higher fire rate and clip size with a slight decrease in per-shot damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BobbleheadVorDesc: [Placeholder] Remember Vor? He's back, in bobblehead form
/Lotus/Language/Items/BoltoRifleDesc: The Boltor fires slow, heavy bolts that are capable of impaling enemies to walls.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BoltonfaDesc: An intimidating Tonfa set designed to match the briary design of the Boltor.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BoltorBundleDesc: Featuring the Boltace tonfa, Boltor rifle, and the Bolto pistol, this bundle contains enough weaponry to shatter the heaviest Grineer armor.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BoltorPrimeDesc: Fires Orokin designed bolts that are faster and sharper.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BossNavCodeDesc: Coordinate used to locate the Lephantis.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BountyHunterBadgeD: The holographic interface on this emblem will update to display the rank achieved through exemplary dedication to Tactical Alerts.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BowModConvertAmmoD: Convert unused ammo drops into Arrows
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrandRemovalItemDe: Safely disengages the Grustrag Bolt from a Warframe
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrassAndGoldAkbolt: Custom edition of the Akbolto forged by Tenno artisans.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrassAndGoldBoltoD: Custom edition of the Bolto forged by Tenno artisans.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrassAndGoldBundle: Features custom Ormolu skins of the Daikyu, Akbolto, Bolto and Tipedo as well as an Kyroptera Ormolu Syandana.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrassAndGoldDaikyu: Custom edition of the Daikyu forged by Tenno artisans.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrassAndGoldScarfD: Custom edition of the Kyroptera Syandana forged by Tenno artisans.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrassAndGoldTipedo: Custom edition of the Tipedo forged by Tenno artisans.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrassKnucklesDesc: These coverings for the hands and feet allow devastating high flying hand-to-hand combat attacks without risking harm to the user.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BratonPrimeDesc: A classic Orokin weapon, Braton Prime features modified damage levels and a larger magazine over the standard model.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerAgileAnimsD: The Agile Animation Set for Atlas.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerAltHelmetDe: A uniquely-styled alternate helmet for Atlas.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerAltTwoHelme: An alternative helmet for the Atlas Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerBarrierAbil: Tectonics Augment - Create up to |NUM_WALLS| walls with |HEALTH_MULT|% health. Walls can no longer be turned into boulders.
Summon a rock-wall, activate again to send the rocks crashing toward the enemy.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerBundleDesc: Crush enemies between a rock and a hard place with this assortment of heavy hitting items. Includes the Atlas Warframe, the Sonicor blaster, the Convectrix laser rifle and the jagged Tekko gauntlets. Enhance progression with 3-Day Affinity and Credit Boosters.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerBundleFeatu: Crush enemies between a rock and a hard place.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerDesc: Titan of stone, lord of the earthly elementals.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerGazeAbility: Petrify Augment - Petrified enemies are scanned into the codex and have a |CHANCE|% chance to drop additional loot when killed.
Fossilize foes with Atlas' hardened gaze.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerHelmetDesc: The standard issue helmet for the Atlas warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerKnucklesDes: These iron fists that rip through foes with each strike are Atlas' signature weapon.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerNobleAnimsD: The Noble Animation Set for Atlas.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerPunchAbilit: [Placeholder] Landslide Augment - Leave behind a trail for |TRAIL_DURATION|s, petrifying enemies that touch it for |STONE_DURATION|s at a rate of |STONE_RATE|%/s.
Bash enemies with an explosive sliding punch, repeat for a devastating combo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BrawlerSummonAbili: Rumblers Augment - Create a single rumbler with |HEALTH_MULT|% health, |DAMAGE_MULT|% damage, and |SPEED_MULT|% speed that taunts nearby enemies into attacking it.
Rumblers Augment - Atlas becomes a Rumbler with rock armor that can absorb up to |ABSORB| damage.
Summon two elemental stone brawlers to the melee.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BroncoPrimeDesc: Infused with rare Orokin alloys, the Bronco Prime is a highly efficient weapon, trading an increased clip size and damage for a lower rate of fire.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BulletAttractorAbi: Boosting this ability increases the area of the magnetic field.
Creates a magnetic field around a target, ensnaring nearby enemies and dealing damage over time. The field reacts to bullets and shards created from Polarize to increase the damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BunnyEarsDesc: A stylish accessory for your Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BurstLaserPistolSt: Fires a small burst of lasers.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BurstPistolDesc: The Sicarus fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of auto-pistols and the accuracy of semi-automatic pistols.
/Lotus/Language/Items/BurstRifleDesc: The Burston fires 3-round bursts, which provides a balance between the lethality of automatic rifles and the accuracy of semi-automatic rifles.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CSReconnasorDesc: Deployed by the Cephalon Suda, once a data-analyzing instrument the Gammacor main focus is defense.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CSScarfDesc: The Synoid Syandana glows more brightly with every scan performed.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CSSimulorDesc: Cephalon Suda’s custom issue Simulor was built to satisfy her curiosity.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CameraDesc: Deploys a short-lived remote camera that overrides your Warframe optics
/Lotus/Language/Items/CandyCaneScytheDes: Celebrate the festive season by unleashing sweet minty death on all your favorite foes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CandyCaneScythePac: Dress up your Ether Reaper, Hate or Reaper Prime with the festive Spearmint Scythe skin!
/Lotus/Language/Items/CannonBarageAbilit: Calls down a barrage of liquid fury
/Lotus/Language/Items/CannonBarrageAbili: [Placeholder] Tempest Barrage Augment - Each projectile has a |CHANCE|% chance of inflicting a corrosive proc.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CaptainVorProfileI: A profile icon of Captain Vor.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CarrierPrimaryPrec: Carrier will attack first visible enemy in range.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CarryAbilityDesc: [Placeholder] Merge with a friend or foe for a duration of time
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowArmorDesc: Decorative armor fitted for a Kavat.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowCatsEyePrec: Adarza Kavat grants increased critical chance to all nearby Tenno for a short duration.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowDistractPre: Allows Smeeta Kavat to become invisible while a decoy kavat draws fire by running toward the enemy.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowEggDesc: Genetic biomass that will evolve into a Kavat.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowGeneticSign: Contains the genetic code sequence of a Kavat.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowHoardPrecep: [Placeholder] The kavat sniffs out loot hidden in crates and dropped by enemies, retrieving these items for its master.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowLuckPrecept: Smeeta Kavat bestows its owner with good fortune during the course of a mission.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowMarkTerrito: The Kavat marks their territory, pacifying any wild creature within it.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowPetPatternA: An intricate fur pattern for your Kavat.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowPetPatternB: An intricate fur pattern for your Kavat.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowPetPatternC: An intricate fur pattern for your Kavat.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowPetPatternD: An intricate fur pattern for your Kavat.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowPouncePrece: The Kavat pounces at an enemy, stunning them for a short duration.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowReflectPrec: Adarza Kavat will occasionally reflect and amplify damage back to an enemy.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowRoarPrecept: The Kavat unleashes a blood-curdling roar, striking fear into its enemies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/CatbrowShredPrecep: A vicious attack that sunders armour and rends flesh.

/Lotus/Language/Items/DragonScalesAbilit: Vex Armor Augment - Taking |DMG_REQ| damage will trigger a |RADIUS|m burst. Shield damage will cause a puncture proc while health damage will cause a blast proc.
When shields are hit, Chroma's armor grows stronger, when health takes a hit, weapon damage increases.

/Lotus/Language/Items/DropAbilityAugment: Antimatter Drop Augment - Absorbs enemy bullets within |RANGE| meters, increasing its damage when it explodes.
Antimatter Drop Augment - Creates a fully charged stationary orb that explodes after |DURATION|s or within enemy proximity.

/Lotus/Language/Items/DualVastosDesc: Vasto revolvers equipped in each hand.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EMPPushAbilityDesc: The Warframe emits a massive pulse of energy, stunning nearby enemies and sending them flying.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EclipseAbilityAugm: Eclipse Augment - While active, allies within |RANGE| meters gain |PERCENT|% benefit from Eclipse.
Eclipse Augment - While active, allies within |RANGE| meters gain |PERCENT|% benefit from Eclipse.

Exhale a deep breath of elemental destruction. Chroma's energy color determines the element.

/Lotus/Language/Items/ErosionCapeDesc: Evokes stone scarred but not destroyed by the sea's tireless onslaught.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EtherScytheDesc: With a blade forged from the same material as the Ether Sword, the Ether Reaper delivers quick death to its victims.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EtherSwordDesc: A single blade for more precision. The Ether Sword cuts so cleanly that it was considered by the Tenno to be a more humane weapon for ‘cleansing’ infested allies.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EventDoubleAffinit: All Tenno acquire affinity at double the rate.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EventDoubleCredits: All Tenno acquire credits at double the rate.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EventDoubleDropRat: All Tenno acquire items at double the drop rate.
/Lotus/Language/Items/EventDoublePickupA: All Tenno acquire drops at double the amount.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburAgileAnim: The Agile Animation Set for Excalibur.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburAltHelmet: Pendragon Helmet for the Excalibur Warframe.
Avalon Helmet for the Excalibur Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburAlternate: A uniquely-styled alternate helmet for Excalibur.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburDefaultHe: The standard issue helmet for the Excalibur warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburDesc: A perfect balance of mobility and offense, Excalibur is the ideal Warframe for new players.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburNobleAnim: The Noble Animation Set for Excalibur.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburPrimeAlab: An alternate body skin for Excalibur Prime
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburPrimeDesc: Excalibur Prime is the epitome of mobility and offense, and features the same abilities as Excalibur, but has unique mod polarities installed allowing for greater customization.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburPrimeHelm: The standard issue helmet for the Excalibur Prime Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburPrimeImmo: The Immortal skin for the Excalibur Prime Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburUmbraHelm: The standard issue helmet for the Excalibur Umbra Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcaliburUmbraSekh: A symbol held sacred by a shadowy order of Tenno.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExcavationEventBad: Awarded to Tenno for their contribution to the Cryotic Front event.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExhaustTrailAbilit: Vents out the Archwing's propulsion core, confusing enemy projectiles and causing them to detonate.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExhaustTrailAugmen: Core Vent Augment - Blast damage ignites exhaust fumes for |DURATION| secs. Enemies passing through the flames take |DAMAGE| Heat damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ExplosiveDissolveA: Saryn pollutes the atmosphere with a lethally poisonous mist that corrodes all enemies in range. Deals additional damage to enemies under Toxin and Viral effects.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FairyAgileAnimsDes: The Agile Animation Set for Titania.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FairyNobleAnimsDes: The Noble Animation Set for Titania.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FalseProfitAccesso: A sigil and an emblem commemorating the Tenno's victory over Nef Anyo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FalseProfitEventBa: An emblem awarded to all those who helped foil the machinations of Nef Anyo.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FalseProfitEventMo: A collection of Mods that apply bonus Impact damage.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FangPrimeDesc: A set of ceremonial daggers from the Orokin era, the Fang Prime's blades resonate violently as they strike. This allows them to pierce hardened materials like armor with ease.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FemaleS2HelmetPack: A series 2 helmet for Banshee, Ember, Nyx, Mag, Saryn, Trinity and Nova!
/Lotus/Language/Items/FemaleSuitPackBDes: Unlock Saryn, Banshee and Nyx Warframes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FemaleSuitPackDesc: Unlock Mag, Trinity, and Ember Warframes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FerriteDesc: Alloy pellets used in Grineer manufacturing.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FinSwordDesc: An enigmatic blade of unknown origin. Delivers a high percentage of critical strikes.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireBallAbilityAug: Fireball Augment - Casting on allies will add |DAMAGE_INCREASE|% Fire damage to their attacks for |DURATION| seconds.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireBallAbilityBoo: Boosting this ability increases the initial impact damage and the duration of the lingering flames.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireBallAbilityDes: Launches a fiery projectile.  It deals high fire damage on contact and moderate fire damage to any who enter the lingering flames.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireBlastAbilityAu: Fire Blast Augment - Damage done by Fire Blast has a |PROC_CHANCE|% chance to cause enemies to panic.
Fire Blast Augment - Allies that enter the fire will have up to |NUM_DEBUFF| debuffs removed.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireBlastAbilityBo: Boosting this ability increases the initial slam damage and the duration of the fire ring.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireBlastAbilityDe: Slams the ground for high damage in a small radius and creates a persistent ring of fire which deals high damage over time.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireFlyScarfDesc: This wing-like syandana invokes the beauty and agility of the Ceresean Butterfly Sparrow.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireShieldAbilityD: Forms a protective energy shell around the Warframe
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireShieldAugmentA: Energy Shell Augment - Energy Shell applies to allies within |val|m.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireSigilDesc: Show the burning passion in your heart.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireworksCrateDesc: Want a more spectacular fireworks display to show your patriotism? Celebrate in style with this single use consumable item.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FireworksSingleDes: Celebrate the holiday with fireworks! Light up the sky with this single use consumable item.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FistDesc: These power gauntlets lack the range of most melee weapons, but Furax is far more devastating when you strike an enemy in close combat.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FistStanceADesc: Fast, multi-hit strikes with powerful finishers.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FiveShotSniperRifl: Scope out the enemy with this long-range revolver style rifle.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FlameScarfDesc: During the Orokin Era, only the most fierce warriors were permitted to wear this flaming Syandana.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FlareCounterMeasur: Drops flare beacons confusing incoming guided missiles.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FlowerPowerPolearm: During the darkest days of the Old War many a Tenno relied solely on the Tonbo to keep them alive.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FomorianNegatorBet: [Placeholder] Use this to destroy Beta MacGuffins.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FomorianNegatorDes: When activated, it disrupts a Fomorian core's Omega energy field, making it vulnerable. Also shields Tenno from Omega radiation.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FomorianRevengeMod: A series of Mods awarded to players who contributed to the Eyes of Blight event.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FomorianRevengeSki: Includes the FLUCTUS RAHK SKIN and the EYES OF BLIGHT EMBLEM.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoAfurisDe: Forest camouflage skin for the Afuris.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoAkvastoD: Forest camouflage skin for the Akvasto.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoBallisti: Forest camouflage skin for the Ballistica.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoBoltorDe: Forest camouflage skin for the Boltor.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoBratonDe: Forest camouflage skin for the Braton and Braton Vandal.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoBundleDe: A new look for your arsenal. This pack contains 13 forest-camouflage weapon skins and camouflage skin for the Dethcube Sentinel.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoDethcube: Forest camouflage skin for the Dethcube.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoDualHeat: Forest camouflage skin for the Dual Heat Swords.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoDualZore: Forest camouflage skin for the Dual Zoren.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoFurisDes: Forest camouflage skin for the Furis.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoHeatDagg: Forest camouflage skin for the Heat Dagger.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoHeatSwor: Forest camouflage skin for the Heat Sword.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoOrthosDe: Forest camouflage skin for the Orthos.

/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoVastoDes: Forest camouflage skin for the Vasto.
/Lotus/Language/Items/ForestCamoVectisDe: Forest camouflage skin for the Vectis.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FormaDesc: This shape-altering component is fundamental to Orokin construction. Allows you to change the polarity of a mod slot on a Warframe, Sentinel or Weapon and then resets their affinity to Level 1. This can only be used on Level 30 Warframes, Sentinels and Weapons.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FoundersBadgeDisci: This emblem signifies the wearer as being a Disciple within the Tenno ranks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FoundersBadgeGrand: This emblem signifies the wearer as being a Grand Master within the Tenno ranks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FoundersBadgeHunte: This emblem signifies the wearer as being a Hunter within the Tenno ranks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FoundersBadgeMaste: This emblem signifies the wearer as being a Master within the Tenno ranks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FreezeAbilityAugme: Freeze Augment - Casting on allies will add |DAMAGE_INCREASE|% Cold damage to their attacks for |DURATION| seconds.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FreezeAbilityBoost: Boost the amount of damage done with Freeze.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FreezeAbilityDesc: A frigid energy blast that freezes targets in their tracks.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostAgileAnimsDes: The Agile Animation Set for Frost.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostAltHelmet2Des: Squall Helmet for the Frost Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostAltHelmetDesc: Aurora Helmet for the Frost Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostDefaultHelmet: The standard issue helmet for the Frost warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostDesc: By channeling moisture and vapor in the surrounding environment, Frost creates formidable defenses and lethal attacks from sub zero conditions.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostNobleAnimsDes: The Noble Animation Set for Frost.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostPackDesc: Get Frost and all his favorite gear.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostPrimeDesc: Frost Prime has the same chilling abilities as Frost but its altered mod polarities offer different possibilities for customization. It is also rumored that this Warframe has a unique reaction to certain Orokin technology.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostPrimeHelmetDe: The standard issue helmet for the Frost Prime Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostPrimeImmortal: The Immortal skin for the Frost Prime Warframe.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FrostPrimeVaultBan: Now Available for a Limited Time
/Lotus/Language/Items/FuraxWraithDesc: These Wraith gauntlets have been augmented for power.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FurtiveKubrowDesc: Prized for its ability to sneak up on unsuspecting prey, the Huras Kubrow were first used as hunting companions by the Orokin elite. Orokin Era Tenno soon adapted the strain for use in covert missions and assassinations.
/Lotus/Language/Items/FusionPartDesc: Consumed in the fusion process to power up existing Mods.
/Lotus/Language/Items/GCBeastMasterProfi: A profile icon of Executioner Zura
/Lotus/Language/Items/GCChargerProfileIc: A profile icon of Executioner Garesh
/Lotus/Language/Items/GCEngineerProfileI: A profile icon of Executioner Reth
/Lotus/Language/Items/GCGruntProfileIcon: A profile icon of Executioner Nok
